CustomField.description: Health metric review score. Saver review 20% weighting, sponsor/trustee review 80% weighting.
CustomField.formula: IF( (ISNULL( Most_Recent_Review_Saver__c )= True && ISNULL( Most_Recent_Review_Sponsor_Trustee__c )= False), CASE((Most_Recent_Review_Sponsor_Trustee__c),1,-1,2,-1,3,0,4,1,5,1,0), IF( (ISNULL(Most_Recent_Review_Saver__c)= False && ISNULL(Most_Recent_Review_Sponsor_Trustee__c)=True), CASE(( Most_Recent_Review_Saver__c),1,-1,2,-1,3,0,4,1,5,1,0), IF( (ISNULL(Most_Recent_Review_Saver__c)= False && ISNULL(Most_Recent_Review_Sponsor_Trustee__c)=False), CASE(ROUND((Most_Recent_Review_Saver__c*0.2)+(Most_Recent_Review_Sponsor_Trustee__c*0.8), 0),1,-1,2,-1,3,0,4,1,5,1,0),0)))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Health metric review score. Saver review 20% weighting, sponsor/trustee review 80% weighting.
CustomField.label: Review HM Score (Deprecated)
